Name: rad_coord
Description: Locations of radial sections on the blade

Name: twist
Description: Twist angle at each radial section

Name: chord
Description: Chord length at each radial section

Name: depth
Description: Water deph from mean mean water level to bed

Name: hub_depth
Description: Depth of turbine hub centre from mean water level

Name: yaw
Description: Yaw angle relative to the freestream and rotor plane

Name: hub_velocity
Description: Mean flow velocity at the hub centre

Name: shear_law
Description: Power law exponent for depthwise velocity profile

Name: waves
Description: 1 (true): waves are on; 0 (false): waves are off)

Name: waves_H
Description: Wave height from trough to crest

Name: wave_dir
Description: Wave direction relative to the freestream

Name: turbulence
Description: 1 (true): turbulence is on; 0 (false): turbulence is off

Name: turb_spec
Description: Name abreviation of the turbulence specturm used to genertate synthetic turbulence fluctuations

Name: turb_intensity
Description: Ratio of fluctuations of the freestream velocity
